result.description: Percentage of the time the processor is busy doing non-idle threads
result.name: WMI_PERCENT_PROCESSOR_TIME

result.description: Percentage of the time the selected physical disks are busy servicing read or write requests
result.name: WMI_PERCENT_DISKS_TIME

result.description: Amount of memory immediately available for allocation to a process or for system use
result.name: WMI_ALLOCATION_AVAILABLE_BYTES

result.description: A high rate of memory operations involving disk swap are symptoms of memory shortage and affects system performance
result.name: WMI_MEMORY_SWAP_RATE

result.description: FreeSpace is the available storage space in bytes on the specified logical disk
result.name: WMI_FREE_DISKS_SPACE

result.description: BytesReceivedPersec are the current transmission rates for the specified adapter
result.name: WMI_NETWORK_BYTES_RECEIVED_PERSEC

result.description: BytesSentPersec are the current transmission rates for the specified adapter
result.name: WMI_NETWORK_BYTES_SENT_PERSEC

result.description: ConnectionEstablished, seen in the code above, is the current number of Established connections, inbound and outbound
result.name: WMI_CONNECTIONS_ESTABLISHED
